title:
KYBO 3.0.0
***marvel***
Captain America: The First Avenger http://thevideo.me/ficn0m7u6wvt http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/3/37/Captain_America_The_First_Avenger_poster.jpg http://cdn.collider.com/wp-content/uploads/captain-america-the-first-avenger-movie-image-76.jpg Steve Rogers, a rejected military soldier transforms into Captain America after taking a dose of a "Super-Soldier serum". But being Captain America comes at a price as he attempts to take down a war monger and a terrorist organization.
Captain America: The Winter Soldier http://nosvideo.com/?v=e4fo98od9t7i http://a3.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Video5/v4/b2/a9/e7/b2a9e727-f6ff-0e5a-6249-f73f5aeb7475/poster212x312.jpeg https://ageeksblogdotcom1.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/nick-fury-captain-america-black-widow-winter-soldier-2014-movie-hd-1920x1080.jpg As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with another super soldier, the black widow, to battle a new threat from old history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
Thor http://180upload.com/gbx71zup4yl1 http://static.rogerebert.com/uploads/movie/movie_poster/thor-2011/large_jqcMUV73jEhO0gv5yi28FD8JbHQ.jpg http://moviestorrents.net/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/Thor-2011.jpg The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
Thor: The Dark World http://180upload.com/29y36oekkng7 http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130906231737/marveldatabase/images/8/8e/Thor_The_Dark_World_poster_006.jpg http://schmoesknow.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/thor-and-jane-foster-thor-the-dark-world-23132-1920x1080.jpg When Dr Jane Foster gets cursed with a powerful object, Thor must protect it before an army and its ruthless leader try to get their hands on it to take over the remains of Earth.
Iron Man http://played.to/u28axp29vyh0 http://www.dvdactive.com/images/news/screenshot/2008/8/ironman1discr1artpic1.jpg http://www.digitaltrx.com/wp-content/themes/DigitalTRX/res/img/works/hi-res/ryoma/iron_man/ironman_HI.jpg After being held captive in an Afghan cave, an industrialist creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight against evil. This leads him to conflict within his own company.
Iron Man 2 http://vidspot.net/6hyluxymclr9 http://www.coverwhiz.com/content/Iron-Man-2.jpg http://images.sequart.org/images/Stark-Expo-from-Iron-Man-2.jpg With the world now aware of his identity as Iron Man, Tony Stark must contend with both his declining health and a vengeful mad man with ties to his father's legacy.
Iron Man 3 http://bestreams.net/9zm15ot03erx http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-paTrAGBMFmo/UijAUaM2QlI/AAAAAAAAB9c/nEh8Dx4qTiM/s1600/Iron+Man+3+(2013).jpg http://wp.production.patheos.com/blogs/lookingcloser/files/2013/05/Iron-Man-3.jpg When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
The Incredible Hulk http://180upload.com/wbpoqc8f3etz http://dreampunk.me/wp-content/images/ihulkposter.jpg http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130712153020/villains/images/8/83/The-Incredible-Hulk-HD-Wallpaper.jpg Bruce Banner, a scientist on the run from the U.S. Government must find a cure for the monster he emerges whenever he loses his temper. However, Banner then must fight a soldier whom unleashes himself as a threat stronger than he.
The Avengers http://180upload.com/6dm9rws4uy0w http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120506232435/disney/images/4/45/The_Avengers_poster.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/-m6UKS1L0YQ/maxresdefault.jpg Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
X-Men Origins: Wolverine http://180upload.com/81ay1ib59hos http://static.rogerebert.com/uploads/movie/movie_poster/x-men-origins-wolverine-2009/large_vbaV7DalSF6Uy4qLyVK7uNdtmFy.jpg http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/02/uk-dvd/fox/Wolverine2.jpg A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Team X and the impact it will have on his later years.
The Wolverine http://180upload.com/4dw6j1rff78r http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/7/74/The_Wolverine_posterUS.jpg http://schmoesknow.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/the-wolverine-description-507580.jpg When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.
X-Men: First Class http://180upload.com/iyq12j46z77q http://i.jeded.com/i/x-men-first-class.14189.jpg https://vicsmovieden.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/x_men_first_class_2011_movie-wide.jpg In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start world war III.
X-Men: Days of Future Past http://180upload.com/94zbasxyzghu http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/0/0c/X-Men_Days_of_Future_Past_poster.jpg http://cdn.screenrant.com/wp-content/uploads/X-Men-Days-of-Future-Past-banner.jpg The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.
Guardians of the Galaxy http://180upload.com/7q925vcrbehu http://cdn.screenrant.com/wp-content/uploads/Guardians-of-the-Galaxy-Poster-High-Res-570x844.jpg http://posterposse.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/12/Guardians-of-the-Galaxy-First-Official-Photo-HIGH-RES.jpg A group of intergalactic criminals are forced to work together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
The Amazing Spider-Man http://vodlocker.com/k4x2qx0pi5o0 http://hottoysblog.net/wp-content/uploads/2012/07/Hot-Toys-The-Amazing-Spiderman-14.jpg http://www.flickeringmyth.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Spider-Man-Image-1.jpg After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to solve the mystery of his parent's mysterious death.
The Amazing Spider-Man 2 http://vidspot.net/5nqc5tr8y1lm http://image.tmdb.org/t/p/original/wLNUUkxfvH9TbYUX56uJLmoTmCE.jpg http://cdn1.sciencefiction.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/AmazingSpiderMan2Banner.jpg When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.
